timeline.bodyText: nit: add a new line its easier to read

timeline.bodyText: Do you think it will make a different to extract StyledAnchorTag out and have a const that takes in href variable and children text. It might not be much since its just one tag however its been used so many times i am just curious

replies.bodyText: Do you mean another wrapper around StyledAnchorTag? Maybe. I can add it.
